name: Canva Pro Subscription
description: Canva Pro makes it easy to create designs, presentations, and social media posts with premium templates and fonts. It includes background remover and brand kit tools for consistent branding. Perfect for marketers, designers, and business owners who want professional visuals.

name: Adobe Creative Cloud
description: Adobe Creative Cloud gives access to industry-leading apps like Photoshop, Illustrator, and Premiere Pro. It provides seamless integration across tools and includes cloud storage for projects. The subscription ensures regular updates and powerful creative features.

name: Figma Professional
description: Figma Professional is a collaborative design tool for teams working in real time. It supports prototyping, design systems, and unlimited projects. The plan also includes extensive version history to track and manage design changes.

name: Microsoft Office 365
description: Microsoft Office 365 provides Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Teams with cloud storage included. It helps individuals and teams stay productive across devices. The package ensures continuous updates and collaboration features.

name: Windows 11 Pro License
description: Windows 11 Pro offers a modern interface with advanced security and productivity tools. It includes BitLocker encryption, remote desktop access, and lifetime support. This one-time purchase ensures long-term reliability for professionals and businesses.

name: Notion Premium
description: Notion Premium is an all-in-one workspace for notes, projects, and collaboration. It offers unlimited blocks, team sharing, and API integration for workflow automation. Suitable for individuals and teams managing content and projects.

name: Digital Marketing Course
description: This Digital Marketing Course covers SEO, SEM, and social media strategies. Learners gain lifetime access to training materials and live Q&A sessions. A completion certificate is provided after finishing the course.

name: Web Development Bootcamp
description: This bootcamp teaches HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and full-stack development. It includes hands-on projects, mentor support, and lifetime access. Students also receive a certificate of completion and career support.

name: AI & Machine Learning Course
description: This course introduces AI, machine learning, and deep learning with Python. Learners complete real-world projects and a capstone project to showcase skills. A certification is awarded upon successful completion.

name: Web Development Service
description: This service provides professional website design and development for businesses. It includes responsive layouts, e-commerce setup, and SEO optimization. Ongoing maintenance ensures the site remains secure and high performing.

name: Mobile App Development
description: We build cross-platform mobile apps for iOS and Android with custom UI and API integration. The service includes publishing to app stores and free bug fixes. Maintenance packages keep the app secure and updated.

name: E-commerce Development
description: Our e-commerce solutions include custom storefronts, payment integration, and inventory management. We also provide marketing integration and scalable systems for business growth. Maintenance support keeps the store running smoothly and securely.
